name: Mergem
description:
Controls
  • Mouse/LMB: Drag & drop
Objective

Drag and drop items to merge them. Try to increase the complexity!

Details

This game was entirely made in the last 36 hours of Ludum Dare using first-party assets after the failure of two other game prototypes.

  • Engine: Unity 2019.2.8f1
  • Source-code editor: Microsoft Visual Studio 2017
  • Graphics editor: Aseprite
  • SFX editor: Musescore 3
  • Music editor: Musescore 3

Thanks for playing!
